other_tests.findings: Numerous eosinophils and lack of evidence of tumor involvement deeper than submucosa for inflammatory fibroid polyps; positive for CD34 and variable PDGFRA positivity. Fibrous tumors were CD117− and DOG1−.
Biopsies consistent with inflammatory fibroid polyp in the two smaller lesions; yielded no diagnostic samples from the larger one.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The larger lesion increased to 40 mm in 16 months.

other_tests.findings: Identification of a novel inherited PDGFRA mutation (P653L).
Two gastric GISTs and three gastric inflammatory fibroid polyps were resected.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient was free of disease 48 months post-surgery.
